ids_info.name: calorimetry
ids_info.description: Calometry measurements on various tokamak subsystems

calorimetry/group.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: calorimetry/group
IDS: calorimetry
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 1
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 2
PARENT_CONTAINER: calorimetry
FIELD_NAME: group
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: calorimetry -> group

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Set of groups of components on which calorimetry measurements are carried out (grouped by tokamak subsystems or localization on the machine)

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[calorimetry]: Calometry measurements on various tokamak subsystems

calorimetry/group/component/power/validi.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: calorimetry/group/component/power/validity_timed
IDS: calorimetry
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 4
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 5
PARENT_CONTAINER: calorimetry/group/component/power
FIELD_NAME: validity_timed
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: calorimetry -> group -> component -> power -> validity_timed

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Indicator of the validity of the data for each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity)

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[calorimetry]: Calometry measurements on various tokamak subsystems
CONTAINER[calorimetry/group]: Set of groups of components on which calorimetry measurements are carried out (grouped by tokamak subsystems or localization on the machine)
CONTAINER[calorimetry/group/component]: Set of components on which calorimetry measurements are carried out
CONTAINER[calorimetry/group/component/power]: Power extracted from the component

FIELD_NAME: validity
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: calorimetry -> group -> component -> power -> validity

calorimetry/group/component/mass_flow/va.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: calorimetry/group/component/mass_flow/validity_timed
IDS: calorimetry
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 4
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 5
PARENT_CONTAINER: calorimetry/group/component/mass_flow
FIELD_NAME: validity_timed
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: calorimetry -> group -> component -> mass_flow -> validity_timed

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Indicator of the validity of the data for each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity)
